entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-08-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • RevEng: Dedupe code in scaffolding code generator #25546
    type-cleanup, area-scaffolding
  • RevEng: Add end to end tests which checks from database script to generated code #25543
    area-test
  • RevEng: Foreign key annotations are not printed if it has default facets for core #25542
    customer-reported

Updated

  • Operation on Entities without code dublication #25551
    customer-reported
  • EntityFrameworkCore.Internal.LazyLoader using lots of memory #25486
    closed-question, customer-reported
  • Scaffold-DbContext with UseDatabaseNames options not working correctly #25503
    customer-reported
  • PMC Tools: Build only the active project, not the whole solution #9716
    type-enhancement, area-tools, punted-for-6.0, Backlog
  • Please update SQLitePCLRaw.bundle_e_sqlite3 from 2.0.2 to 2.0.4 in EFCore 3.1.* #25497
    type-enhancement, closed-fixed, Servicing-consider, customer-reported, area-adonet-sqlite
  • RevEng: Add end to end tests which checks from database script to generated code #25543
    area-test
  • 5.0.9 release notes says there are no changes, but there are #25549
    customer-reported
  • Conditionally mapping two entities to a base entity #25517
    customer-reported
  • EF Core 5.0.1 problem with enum store in tinyint #23858
    type-bug, customer-reported, area-query, area-vb, 6.0.0
  • Breaking Change - Not truncating/rounding decimals after upgrade to EF Core 5, Out of Range Exception #25499
    customer-reported

PullRequests

Created

  • Add translation for DateTime.UtcNow #25545
  • Add scalar type configuration support to compiled models. #25540

Merged

  • SQLite: Revert multi-threading change #25541
  • Use the pre-convention type mapping configuration in query #25509
  • [main] Update dependencies from dotnet/arcade #25534
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • Disable SSL certificate validation in Cosmos tests #25528
  • [main] Update dependencies from dotnet/runtime #25533
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:

Updated

  • Update SQLite dependencies to 2.0.4 #25550
    Servicing-consider, 3.1.x
  • Add translation for DateTime.UtcNow #25545
  • Add scalar type configuration support to compiled models. #25540
  • Approach for referencing conceptual docs #25530
